snippet: The five days of horse racing are fine, but so is the accompanying fashion display, which has strict rules and culminates on Ladies’ Day.
abstract: Racegoers at England's Royal Ascot must adhere to strict dress code, and each of race track's areas follow different rules.
lead_paragraph: The five days of horse racing are fine, but so is the accompanying fashion display, which has strict rules and culminates on Ladies’ Day.

headline.main: Want to See Royal Ascot Races? Bettor, Bring Your Top Hat
headline.print_headline: Want to See Ascot Races? Bettor, Bring Your Top Hat
